net.sourceforge.barcodegen.print

Class PrintThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • net.sourceforge.barcodegen.print.PrintThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PrintThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Created by Administrator on 8/18/14. PrintThread is a loop that performs 2 vital functions Constantly pooling the Printer to detect change in status Send images to printer when printer status is OK It takes is printing tasks from PrintJob The images are fetched from GenerationJob PrintThread maintains its own list of SubJobs at PrintJob so that it can provide accurate information on what labels has been sent to printer and stop accordingly
